content.value:
‚ÄúToo many people bring the best of themselves to work, and bring the leftovers home.‚Äù Esther Perel

Ouch.

30yo me would have benefitted from hearing that.

She would probably have been too distracted by the singing of the career sirens for the message to land properly though.
